summary: 1997 CHRYSLER TOWN AND COUNTRY. THE AIR BAG LIGHT ILLUMINATED, THE DEALER STATED THE CLOCK SPRING SHORTED OUT INTERNALLY, HOWEVER THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A NOTICE IN THE MAIL, REGARDING THE CLOCK SPRING AND THAT IT WOULD BE REPLACED REGARDLESS OF MILEAGE. THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT ILLUMINATED, THE DEALER REPLACED THE EGR VALVE.  *JB
